name: Pong Study
description:
I made this in a couple of days mostly just wanting to improve my skills. All music in this project was created by me. 

OBJECTIVE: Block the ball from reaching the bottom of the screen with your paddle. The ball must hit the top of your paddle, sides do not count, but will send the ball back.  Reach the score target to win. Some levels have some variations and surprises. 

Controls:

Mouse to move paddle

Left mouse button to select

P to pause 

SPACE key to reset level
